input_text: Despite the fact that it was raining heavily, the marathon runners continued their race with determination and enthusiasm.

translations.to_french: Malgré le fait qu'il pluvait à verse, les coureurs de marathon ont poursuivi leur course avec détermination et enthousiasme.
translations.to_english: Despite the fact that it was raining heavily, the marathon runners continued their race with determination and enthusiasm.

input_text: She postponed the meeting until her manager, who had been away on a business trip, returned to the office with the final approval.

translations.to_french: Elle a reporté la réunion jusqu'à ce que son responsable, qui avait été en déplacement professionnel, retourne au bureau avec l'approbation finale.
translations.to_english: She postponed the meeting until her manager, who had been on a business trip, returned to the office with the final approval.

input_text: While I enjoy spending time with friends at the beach, I often find myself yearning for the solitude of the mountains.

translations.to_french: Alors que j'apprécie passer du temps avec des amis à la plage, je me surprends souvent à aspirer à la solitude des montagnes.
translations.to_english: While I enjoy spending time with friends at the beach, I often find myself longing for the solitude of the mountains.

input_text: The scientist explained the experiment in detail so that everyone, including those without a background in physics, could understand the significance of the findings.

translations.to_french: Le scientifique a expliqué l'expérience en détail afin que tout le monde, y compris ceux qui n'ont pas de connaissances en physique, puisse comprendre la signification des résultats.
translations.to_english: The scientist explained the experiment in detail so that everyone, including those with no knowledge of physics, could understand the meaning of the results.

input_text: If you work hard and stay focused on your goals, you will achieve more than you ever thought possible in life.

translations.to_french: Si vous travaillez dur et restez concentré sur vos objectifs, vous accomplirez plus que vous ne l'auriez jamais cru possible dans la vie.
translations.to_english: If you work hard and stay focused on your goals, you will accomplish more than you ever thought possible in life.

input_text: Although the restaurant was highly recommended by locals, the service was slow, and the food did not live up to our expectations.

translations.to_french: Bien que le restaurant nous ait été chaudement recommandé par les locaux, le service était lent et la nourriture n'a pas été à la hauteur de nos attentes.
translations.to_english: Although the restaurant had been highly recommended by the locals, the service was slow and the food did not meet our expectations.

input_text: Because she studied diligently every night for the past month, Maria performed exceptionally well on her final exams.

translations.to_french: Parce qu'elle a étudié diligemment chaque soir pendant le dernier mois, Maria a exceptionnellement bien réussi ses examens finaux.
translations.to_english: Because she studied diligently every evening for the last month, Maria exceptionally succeeded in her final exams.

input_text: The company implemented new policies to improve employee satisfaction, which, in turn, led to increased productivity across all departments.

translations.to_french: La société a mis en œuvre de nouvelles politiques pour améliorer la satisfaction des employés, ce qui, à son tour, a conduit à une augmentation de la productivité dans tous les départements.
translations.to_english: The company implemented new policies to improve employee satisfaction, which in turn led to an increase in productivity across all departments.

input_text: After the storm had passed and the sun reappeared, the children ventured outside to play in the puddles left behind.

translations.to_french: Après que la tempête fut passée et que le soleil eut réapparu, les enfants se sont aventurés dehors pour jouer dans les flaques laissées derrière.
translations.to_english: After the storm had passed and the sun had reappeared, the children ventured outside to play in the puddles left behind.

input_text: Whenever he travels abroad, John makes it a point to learn a few basic phrases in the local language to show respect for the culture.

translations.to_french: À chaque fois qu'il voyage à l'étranger, John s'assure d'apprendre quelques phrases de base dans la langue locale pour montrer du respect pour la culture.
translations.to_english: Every time he travels abroad, John makes sure to learn a few basic phrases in the local language to show respect for the culture.
